entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WebView in MAUI project doesn't scroll when has a PDF file loaded #21346
  • Connect To Mac - Object reference not set to an instance of an object #21344
  • RestrictionManager not returning any values in MAUI android. #21342
    Backlog
  • [Android] Crash when replacing a Layout (Grid or Stacked) in an existing layout #21338
  • Allow Access To External drive Videos #21336
  • RadioButtonGroup.SelectedValue binding not works #21335
  • [8.0.10] Windows FontImageSourceService assumes MSIX packaging #21333
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [MacCatallyst-arm64] app file size is extremely large for custom configuration #21332
  • Unloaded event behaviour in CollectionView header control inconsistent between Android and iOS #21331
  • MAUI Swipe view items looks weird on iOS #21329
  • Link in Label with TextType HTML is not clickable #21328
  • [Android/iOS][NavigationPage] Inheritance of NavigationPage breaks TitleView #21327
  • `Span` does not inherit text styling from `Label` if that styling is applied using `Style` #21326
  • "Grey" cannot be used to set Background property, and doesn't display a preview in the XAML editor #21325
    Backlog
  • Unable to hit debug point in C# Library from Android MAUI .NET7 App #21323
  • Shell navigation with modal page does not show title view #21321

Closed

  • Memory raising when using flyout navigation #21147
  • iOS CollectionView items overlap when their content is resized #21337
    Backlog
  • [MAUI] Place the cursor in the middle of the editor and the cursor will always move to the end for D10 page #18241
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • [Android] CollectionVIew scrolling performance on MAUI lags compared to XF #18505
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Seemingly over-aggressive dependency caching when building iOS app #21302
  • [Windows] Controls.sample project crashes #21324
  • .net8 maui CollectionView.Header bug? #21179
  • XamlC XC0022 warning : Binding could be compiled if x:DataType is specified after upgrade to 8.0.7 #21288

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI] Clean all yaml in the pipelines of warnings and errors and add a workflow to validate the yaml used. #21345
  • [controls] improve perf of "merged" ResourceDictionary lookups #21334
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Testing] Added specific actions by platform #21330
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Android] Fixed box view properties #21322
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, community ✨

Merged

  • [C] use ResourcesChanged to propagate Theme #21229
    area/Xaml </>
  • [net9.0] Update all net9 versions preview3 #21276
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix image button scaling #20953
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • WIP: Update BlazorWebView Device Tests to use newer handle test base classes #21318
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Fixed RadioButton text related properties not working #20366
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-radiobutton
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Rework foreground color and remove outdated methods #21238
  • [android] avoid `OnLayout()` for `Label` #21291
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • [Trimming] Enable trimming and AOT analyzers in Core #21076
    area/app-size 🤏
  • [iOS] Readonly Editor - Scrolling fix #20505
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-editor
  • [iOS] Button CharacterSpacing Fix #20537
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-button
  • [Android] Action mode menu doesn't disappear when switch on another tab - fix #21231
    community ✨
  • [Win] Double tap behavior #20870
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, control-titleview
  • [Android] Fixed border inside frame not rendering #20974
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-border
  • Set Shell Foreground to original color distinction #21286
    area/templates 📄, community ✨
  • [Android] ImageButton Border does not fit to CornerRadius - fix #21259
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fixed Switch Thumb and On Colors #20346
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • [Android] Ecosystem updates WAS:Google Maps bump/update #20783
    platform/android 🤖, area/Maps🗺
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • Make sure to await async test asserts (2) #20506
    area/testing, community ✨
  • [Trimming] Use type converters instead of implicit cast operators (part 2/2) #21052
  • [X] Improve warnings when binding cannot be compiled #21281
  • [Android] Fix Ripple effect with custom background (alternative to #17821) #20412
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Testing] Ported legacy tests to Appium #21175
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Ported randomly failing tests to Appium #21304
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [UI Testing] Split mouse and touch Appium actions and added pending ones (TouchAndHold etc) #21305
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix display of ActionSheet in modal view on Windows #21295
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
